results.message: The title element in the head section should be non-empty.
The html element should have a lang or xml:lang attribute which describes the language of the document.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 4.5:1.
This element's text is placed on a background image. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and all covered parts of the image are at least 7:1.
Check that text of the link describes the purpose of the link.

The heading structure is not logically nested. This h4 element should be an h2 to be properly nested.
This table appears to be a layout table. If it is meant to instead be a data table, ensure header cells are identified using th elements.
Duplicate id attribute value "opening" found on the web page.

This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 7:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 5.7:1. Recommendation: change background to #375b83.
